faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqSection.description: Detailed answers to common questions about buying builder floors in Sector 77 Faridabad.

faqs.question: Is Sector 77 Faridabad a good area to buy a builder floor?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 77 is a planned and developing locality with good connectivity and modern infrastructure.

faqs.question: What is a builder floor?
faqs.answer: A builder floor is an independent residential unit in a low-rise building that offers better privacy than high-rise apartments.

faqs.question: Are builder floors suitable for families?
faqs.answer: Yes, builder floors provide spacious layouts and a peaceful residential environment suitable for families.

faqs.question: What plot sizes are available in Sector 77?
faqs.answer: Builder floors are available on plots ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla.

faqs.question: Are home loans available for builder floors?
faqs.answer: Most builder floors are eligible for home loans, subject to bank approval and documentation.

faqs.question: Is Sector 77 good for investment?
faqs.answer: Yes, due to ongoing development and rising demand, Sector 77 offers good long-term appreciation.

faqs.question: How does Deal Acres help buyers?
faqs.answer: Deal Acres provides verified listings, local insights, and buyer-focused support.

faqs.question: Are daily amenities nearby?
faqs.answer: Yes, schools, hospitals, markets, and transport facilities are easily accessible.

faqs.question: What factors affect builder floor prices in Sector 77?
faqs.answer: Plot size, construction quality, location advantage, and floor level influence pricing.
